Uses of Interface
smile.nlp.relevance.RelevanceRanker

  • Packages that use RelevanceRanker 
    Package Description
    smile.nlp
    Natural language processing.
    smile.nlp.relevance
    Term-document relevance ranking algorithms.

    • Uses of RelevanceRanker in smile.nlp

      Methods in smile.nlp with parameters of type RelevanceRanker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<Relevance> SimpleCorpus.search(RelevanceRanker ranker, java.lang.String term) 
      java.util.Iterator<Relevance> Corpus.search(RelevanceRanker ranker, java.lang.String term)
      Returns an iterator over the set of documents containing the given term in descending order of relevance.
      java.util.Iterator<Relevance> SimpleCorpus.search(RelevanceRanker ranker, java.lang.String[] terms) 
      java.util.Iterator<Relevance> Corpus.search(RelevanceRanker ranker, java.lang.String[] terms)
      Returns an iterator over the set of documents containing (at least one of) the given terms in descending order of relevance.

    • Uses of RelevanceRanker in smile.nlp.relevance

      Classes in smile.nlp.relevance that implement RelevanceRanker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BM25
      The BM25 weighting scheme, often called Okapi weighting, after the system in which it was first implemented, was developed as a way of building a probabilistic model sensitive to term frequency and document length while not introducing too many additional parameters into the model.
      class  TFIDF
      The tf-idf weight (term frequency-inverse document frequency) is a weight often used in information retrieval and text mining.
